bibl.title: Akoris. Report of the Excavations at Akoris in Middle Egypt 1981-1992. (The Paleological Association of Japan, Inc. Egyptian Committee.) [Text]; - Plates. Avec résumés en anglais et en japonais.
bibl.note: tabl., fac-sim., dépl., 304 figg.; - [ii]-6 pll. coul. et 157 pll. n./bl.

P. Akoris 1-93, O. Akoris 1-28 (including many Demotic and Coptic texts). - I. Introduction. - II. Architecture and Stratigraphy. - III. Archeological Remains. - IV. Archeological Studies. - V. Philological Studies [inscriptions, papyri, ostraca]. - VI. Chemical Studies. - VII. Appendix. - VIII. Summary.
Akoris. Report of the Excavations at Akoris in Middle Egypt 1981-1992. (The Paleological Association of Japan, Inc. Egyptian Committee.) [Text]; - Plates. Avec résumés en anglais et en japonais.
Kyoto, Koyo Shobo, 1995, 4°, xix-484 pp., tabl., fac-sim., dépl., 304 figg.; - [ii]-6 pll. coul. et 157 pll. n./bl. ISBN 4-7710-0755-1.
